name: Pub Tumble
description:
'Pub Tumble' - A small parkour game made for Ludum Dare 49.

You’re heading to your favourite boozer for a couple of beers, but you have to make it there first. Don’t get too drunk along the way or you might not make it!

Drinking Beers will Increase your drunkness and make you stumble and sway left to right, water sobers you up - as always!

3D Models & Level Design - AdamJN

Screen Effects, Shaders, & Music - SquishyMew

The more beers, The more your vision slips away from you.


Controls

WASD - Movement

Shift - Spring

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look
